content:
The Kitimat Northern Sentinel wants to publish your holiday recipes

Holidays are a time for family, friends, and of course, food.

Do you have any recipes that you make yearly or that make you think of the holiday season? Is there a special drink, meal, or dessert that makes you feel all holly and jolly inside?

Well the Kitimat Northern Sentinel wants to hear from you! Send you holiday recipes to newsroom@northernsentinel.com to have it featured in the paper this December, and spread a little holiday joy around the Kitimat community.



clare.rayment@northernsentinel.com

Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter
title: All I want for Christmas is…food! – Kitimat Northern Sentinel
